overview: Stage actors have prepared for a play of No-pil’s film, Memory of a Red Rose, which was made 60 years ago. Due to Covid-19, the play was canceled and replaced to non-face-to face video records. A director was disappointed and did not come to the final rehearsal. The actors start practicing without the director but it cannot go well. In the meantime, the sub-director misunderstand a mysterious man as artistic director and create a play with him.
title: Though the Rose has withered
